thread.section_title: Rubber Stamp Champ Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rubber Stamp Champ | rubberstampchamp.com
thread.title: JL
thread.title_full: Rubber Stamp Champ reviewed by JL

author: JL
title: JL
text: I needed a stamp in a hurry. On the phone of them said it would be okay and when I called back in 10 minutes, another person said it wouldn't be possible and that nobody who worked there would have made that promise to me. It ended up working out but then I left work early to pick it up at the arranged time. On the drive there, they told me they were all in the process of closing up (3 hours early) because they always do that on Friday. They left my stamps just outside their door and when I arrived, they were still there! The lady saw me pull up, go back inside and lock the door. I can't recommend this place due to their horrible customer service.
